title: Mythicmobs中的shootpotion（药水投掷）技能怎么用
author: 夜枫宸
txt_content: 如题 有限制使用者种类之类的吗

replies.author: ⊙u⊙
replies.txt_content:
https://www.mythicmobs.net/manua ... chanics/shootpotion

type是药水种类
duration是时长
level是药水等级
velocity是速度

这是官例
ThrownCripplingPotion:
  Skills:
  - shootpotion{type=SLOW;duration=200;level=4;velocity=5} @target复制代码

replies.author: 夜枫宸
replies.txt_content:
⊙u⊙ 发表于 2019-7-21 04:54
https://www.mythicmobs.net/manual/doku.php/skills/mechanics/shootpotion

type是药水种类

我就是直接复制粘贴wiki上的样板没用呀
